block.ftbquests.screen.no_permission: You don't have permission to configure this!
item.ftbquests.barrier.rightclick:
Right-click to configure settings
Middle-click to pick a copy, including settings
item.ftbquests.lootcrate.tooltip_2: Sneak-right-click to open all in hand
item.ftbquests.custom_icon.tooltip: Right-click on 'Icon' in editor to open custom image selector
Sneak + Right-Click a Task Screen block to bind
ftbquests.icon.tooltip:
Custom icon
Shift-click: select an item texture
Alt-click: select an entity texture
Ctrl-click: select an image texture
ftbquests.tags.tooltip: Used for themes and KubeJS events
ftbquests.file.loot_crate_no_drop: Entity Loot Crate Drop Empty Weight
ftbquests.file.pause_game.tooltip: Does not apply to multiplayer games
ftbquests.file.drop_book_on_death: Drop FTB Quests Book on Death
ftbquests.file.hide_excluded_quests.tool: If false, excluded quests will remain visible but grayed out
ftbquests.file.fallback_locale.tooltip:
The locale used for translations not found in the current locale
This can be overridden on the client via Player Preferences
Defaults to 'en_us' if empty
ftbquests.file.detection_delay.tooltip:
Minimum interval (in ticks) between checks of a player's inventory when it changes
Higher values are kinder on server TPS, especially if players inventories change frequently, but mean longer delays for quest auto-completion messages.
ftbquests.file.progression_mode.tooltip:
Linear: quest must be complete before dependant quests are started
Flexible: tasks in dependant quests can be progressed at any time,
  but dependant quests can't be completed until dependency is completed
ftbquests.chapter.subtitle: Subtitle
ftbquests.chapter.image.order.tooltip:
Order in which images in the same chapter are drawn.
Higher order images are drawn above lower orders.
ftbquests.chapter.image.hover.tooltip: You can use literal text or translation keys here
ftbquests.chapter.image.click.tooltip:
Provide custom functionality when the image is clicked:
• Open a page or file with http://, https:// or file:/// URL
• Run a command with 'command:<cmd>'
• Jump to a quest with '#<quest_id>' (use Copy ID to get quest id's)
• Fire a CustomClickEvent (for KubeJS or other mods) with 'custom:<resource_location>'
ftbquests.chapter.appearance.default_min: Default Min Opened Quest Window Width
ftbquests.chapter.visibility.hide_text_u: Hide Text Until Quest is Completed
ftbquests.quest.cannot_copy_many: Copying multiple objects is not supported!
ftbquests.quest.subtitle: Subtitle
ftbquests.quest.appearance.icon_scale.to: Independent of the overall button size
ftbquests.quest.misc.repeat_cooldown.too:
Only applies if 'Repeatable Quest' is true.
The delay in seconds between claiming all the rewards for the quest and being able to redo the quest's tasks.
ftbquests.quest.misc.exclusive.desc: Completing this makes other branches unavailable
ftbquests.quest.hide_dependency_lines.to: Controls display of dependency lines from quests which unlock this one
ftbquests.quest.dependencies.hide_depend: Controls display of dependency lines to quests which are unlocked by this one
ftbquests.quest.dependencies.max_complet:
If > 0, at most this number of dependents can be completed, and uncompleted dependents become unavailable
Useful to have exclusive branches in a questline
ftbquests.quest.min_required_dependencie: If you set this to anything more than 0, it becomes an OR quest, where only certain amount of dependencies is required for it to unlock
ftbquests.quest.visibility.hide_text_unt: Hide Text Until Quest is Completed
Quest details can be opened, but no description text is displayed until the quest is completed
ftbquests.quest.visibility.hide_lock_ico: Hide the lock icon that is normally shown when quest is locked due to a dependency
ftbquests.quest.misc.ignore_reward_block: Offer the quest reward(s) even if rewards are blocked for the team by the '/ftbquests block_rewards' command
ftbquests.quest.visibility.invisible.too:
Quest is invisible to players until completed.
Useful for "easter egg" optional quests.
ftbquests.quest.visibility.invisible_unt: Invisible until X tasks are completed

Only applies if "Invisible Until Completed" is true.
If > 0, quest becomes visible if X or more tasks are completed.
ftbquests.quest.misc.require_sequential_:
When true, tasks must be completed in the strict order in which they were added to the quest
Default means to use chapter setting
ftbquests.chapter.misc.require_sequentia: When true, tasks must be completed in the strict order in which they were added to the quest
ftbquests.chapter.misc.autofocus_id.tool:
If not empty, must be a Quest or Quest Link ID (use Copy Quest ID to obtain).
When chapter is opened, the panel will automatically center the view on this quest
ftbquests.quest.visibility.hide_details_: If true, then quest details (text and tasks) can't be viewed until the quest can be started
ftbquests.quest.text_hidden_outside_edit: Description text hidden outside edit mode: quest not completed
ftbquests.gui.copy_id.paste_hint: You can use this ID to paste quests or quest links
ftbquests.gui.use_as_quest_icon: Use Task Icon as Quest Icon
ftbquests.gui.key_reference.player:
General Controls
-;Zoom out
+;Zoom in
0;Reset Zoom
Tab;Next Chapter
Shift + Tab;Previous Chapter
1 - 9;Go to Chapter
Space;Recenter View
Ctrl + F;Search
F1;While hovering quest, show extended info
Left Mouse;View Quest Details
Mouse Wheel;Scroll Up/Down
Shift + Mouse Wheel;Scroll Left/Right
Ctrl + Mouse Wheel;Zoom In/Out
Backspace;While viewing quest, go to last-viewed quest
Ctrl + P;Player Preferences
ftbquests.gui.key_reference.editor:
Editor Mode
Ctrl + Left Mouse;Toggle Selection
Left Alt + Left Mouse;Properties Editor
Right Alt + Left Mouse;Copy Quest
Middle Mouse;Move Selected Quest(s)
Right Mouse;Context Menu
Middle Mouse: Drag;Select Quests in Drag Box
Ctrl + Middle Mouse: Drag;Toggle Selection in Box
Ctrl + A;Select All
Ctrl + D;Select None
Ctrl + Up/Down/Left/Right;Move Selected Quests
Ctrl + R;Toggle Crosshairs
Ctrl + C;Copy Selected/Hovered Object
Ctrl + V;Paste Selection
Ctrl + Shift + V;Paste Quest (no dependencies)
Ctrl + Alt + V;Paste as Quest Link

Quest View Panel
T;Edit Quest Title
S;Edit Quest Subtitle
D;Edit Quest Description
ftbquests.task.task_screen_only: Items can ONLY be submitted via a Task Screen!
ftbquests.task.ftbquests.item.match_comp:
None: ignore item component data
Fuzzy: only check data components present in the filter stack
Strict: filter stack data components must match the checked item exactly
ftbquests.task.ftbquests.item.task_scree:
When true, items may only be submitted by piping into a Task Screen
Only applies when Consume Items is true for this task.
ftbquests.task.ftbquests.xp.points.toolt: Use XP points to complete instead of levels. Use a calculator to find out what the value should be
ftbquests.task.ftbquests.kill.entity.too: This is ignored if Entity Type Tag is non-empty
ftbquests.task.ftbquests.kill.entity_typ: If non-empty, this takes precedence over the Entity Type
ftbquests.task.ftbquests.kill.custom_nam:
For players, their player name
For other entities, a custom name applied by a Name Tag
ftbquests.task.ftbquests.kill.title: Kill: %sx %s
ftbquests.task.ftbquests.location.x.tool: Minimum X for player (player-X must be >= X and < X+W)
ftbquests.task.ftbquests.location.y.tool: Minimum Y for player (player-Y must be >= Y and < Y+H)
ftbquests.task.ftbquests.location.z.tool: Minimum Z for player (player-Z must be >= Z and < Z+D)
ftbquests.task.ftbquests.gamestage.team_:
Per-team game stages instead of per-player
Can be granted via Stage Reward with Team Reward enabled,
or via '/ftbteams teamstage ...' command
or via FTB Teams API
ftbquests.reward.team_reward.tooltip:
When true, this is one reward for the whole team; only the submitting player receives it
When false, all online players receive the reward
Ignore this reward when the "Claim All" button is clicked
This setting cannot be changed for Loot, Random
 and Choice reward types
ftbquests.reward.ftbquests.item.only_one: If inventory has that item, doesn't give it. Ignores NBT.
ftbquests.reward.ftbquests.command.toolt:
Vanilla substitutions, e.g. @p, are supported
Special substitutions:
{x} / {y} / {z} - player's current X/Y/Z pos
{quest} - ID of this quest
{chapter} - ID of this chapter
{team} - short name of player's team
ftbquests.reward.ftbquests.command.permi:
0 = player
1 = Moderator
2 = Game Master
3 = Server Admin
4 = Server Owner
ftbquests.reward.ftbquests.advancement.c: Optional, set if you want only one criterion to be granted
ftbquests.reward_table.loot_crate.item_n: This may be a translation key
ftbquests.barrier.teleport.relative.tool: When true, destination is relative to Barrier block position
ftbquests.barrier.teleport.dimension.too: Leave empty for teleportation in the current dimension
ftbquests.barrier.teleport.pitch.tooltip: Positive values look down, negative values look up
commands.ftbquests.command.error.no_obje: No quest object found for ID %s!
commands.ftbquests.command.error.no_file: No quest file was found, what's going on?!
commands.ftbquests.command.error.no_inve: Target block does not contain an inventory!
commands.ftbquests.command.error.not_edi: You must be in editing mode (/ftbquests editing_mode) to do this!
commands.ftbquests.command.feedback.tabl: Successfully exported Reward Table '%s' with %s items to the target block!
Successfully imported Reward Table '%s' with %s items!
WARNING: Table %s contains more items than the target block could handle, stopping here!
commands.ftbquests.command.feedback.relo: Quest and progression data reloaded from file!
Note: Quest reloading is a quest developer convenience tool and not recommended for use on live servers.
commands.ftbquests.command.feedback.rewa: Quest reward blocking for for team '%s' set to: %s
commands.ftbquests.command.feedback.clea: Item display cache has been cleared for all players
commands.ftbquests.weigh_from_emc.text: Changed item reward weight based on EMC in %s
ftbquests.ui.old_scroll_wheel.tooltip:
When false, scroll wheel scrolls up & down: hold Shift to pan, Ctrl to zoom
When true, scroll wheel only zooms (1.19 and earlier behavior)
ftbquests.pinned.pinned_quests_inset_x.t:
Inset is toward center of screen.
Ignored if X pos is center.
ftbquests.pinned.pinned_quests_inset_y.t:
Inset is toward center of screen.
Ignored if Y pos is center.
ftbquests.pinned.auto_pin_follows.toolti:
• Chapter: only available quests in the last-viewed chapter are shown
• Quest Book: available quests from every chapter are shown
ftbquests.ui.show_lock_icon.tooltip: Show a padlock icon on any quests which can't yet be started due to dependency or exclusion restrictions.
ftbquests.ui.backspace_history.tooltip:
When true, pressing Backspace while a quest is being viewed opens the previously-viewed quest.
When false, Backspace behaves like Escape, simply closing the quest.
ftbquests.notifications.completion_style:
How to notify you when a task, quest or chapter is completed
Note: 'Action Bar' and 'None' may lead to completion notices being missed
ftbquests.notifications.reward_style.too: How to notify you when a reward is received outside of the reward GUI
ftbquests.notifications.completion_sound: Play sounds when a task, quest or chapter is completed
ftbquests.xlate.editing_locale.tooltip:
The language used for editing FTB Quests text: title text for chapters, quests, tasks and reward tables, subtitles for chapters and quests, and quest description text.
If empty, use the current Minecraft language setting.
ftbquests.xlate.fallback_locale.tooltip:
The locale used for translations not found in the current locale
If empty, defaults to the server-defined questbook fallback locale
ftbquests.xlate.hilite_missing.tooltip: If true, quest text with no translation in the current locale is highlighted when in edit mode and an Editing Locale other than 'en_us'
ftbquests.message.task_screen_inaccessib: Task Screen is not accessible from here!
ftbquests.message.missing_xlate_1: No translation for %s in current locale '%s'
ftbquests.translation_key.title: title
ftbquests.gui.error.already_component: Line is already text component JSON!
